title: Not Red Shirt
summary: DiamondHacks 2025 Winner of 2 Categories: Best E-commerce Product and Best Use of MongoDB Atlas
description: Engineered a full-stack semantic search engine for e-commerce that processes natural language queries with negations (e.g., 'not red shirt') to optimize product discovery and elevate the user experience. Processed 1.4M Amazon listings and filtered 260K clothing items; leveraged LangChain to generate vector embeddings and created 1536-dimensional vectors to power advanced semantic search from our vector database. Integrated multi-input search capabilities including text, voice, and image to deliver a multimodal, accessible, and visually engaging frontend with React and Tailwind CSS. Showcased creative problem-solving, technical excellence, and a sleek, modern interface.

title: TCG Application Portal
summary: Full-stack portal for managing consulting project applications created for Triton Consulting Group
description: Engineered a full-stack portal for managing consulting project applications. Built user authentication, application forms, and admin dashboard.

title: Triton UAS (Unmanned Aerial Systems)
summary: Autonomous drone navigation and mapping system
description: Optimized autonomous drone navigation using A* and RRT* pathfinding algorithms. Developed real-time mapping system to stitch 100+ aerial images into cohesive maps during flight. Maximized mission efficiency through intelligent path planning.

title: Personal Website
summary: Modern portfolio website built with React and Next.js
description: Designed and built a modern portfolio website using React and Next.js. Implemented responsive design, dark mode, and interactive UI components. Focused on clean code architecture and performance optimization.
